FROM user a LEFT JOIN code telecom ON a.userNewsAgency = telecom.cdSeq LEFT JOIN code gender ON a.userGender = gender.cdSeq WHERE 1=1
AND a.uDelMy = #{shDelNy}
AND a.userName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND gender.ifcdName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND telecom.ifcdName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.userPhoneNumber LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.userBirthday LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.userId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.userEmail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
ORDER BY suSeq ASC
mapper.select:
SELECT a.suSeq, a.userName, a.userGender, a.userNewsAgency, a.userPhoneNumber, a.userBirthday, a.userId, a.userEmail, a.userPassword, a.uDelMy, telecom.cdSeq AS telecomCdSeq, telecom.ifcdName AS telecomName, gender.cdSeq AS genderCdSeq, gender.ifcdName AS genderName
limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
SELECT suSeq, userName, userGender, userNewsAgency, userPhoneNumber, userBirthday, userId, userEmail, userPassword FROM user WHERE 1=1 AND suSeq = #{suSeq} ORDER BY suSeq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userName = #{userName}, userGender = #{userGender}, userNewsAgency = #{userNewsAgency}, userPhoneNumber = #{userPhoneNumber}, userBirthday = #{userBirthday}, userId = #{userId}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userPassword = #{userPassword} WHERE suSeq = #{suSeq}
UPDATE user SET uDelMy = 1 WHERE suSeq = #{suSeq}
